tool_description: Generates final warehouse assignments for orders based on optimization results and creates fulfillment instructions.

assigned_warehouse_id.description: Warehouse assigned to fulfill the order

fulfillment_priority.description: Processing priority (1-10, higher is more urgent)

error_messages: Invalid order ID: Order ID must be a non-empty string.
Invalid warehouse ID: Warehouse identifier not recognized or inactive.
Invalid priority: Priority must be an integer between 1 and 10.
Invalid ship date: Expected ship date must be in ISO 8601 format and not in the past.
Invalid shipping method: Must be one of: ground, express, overnight.
usage: Provide order_id, assigned_warehouse_id, fulfillment_priority, expected_ship_date, and shipping_method to generate final warehouse assignment and fulfillment instructions.

assignment_id.description: Unique identifier for the warehouse assignment

fulfillment_instructions.description: Detailed instructions for warehouse fulfillment team

estimated_completion_time.description: Estimated completion time for order processing
